DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Karenitecin (BNP1350) as a treatment for Malignant Melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Karenitecin (BNP1350) to Treat Malignant Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of malignant melanoma Measurable disease Granulocytes ≥1,500/µl, Platelets ≥100,000/µl, Creatinine ≤ULN, Bilirubin ≤1.5 mg/dl, AST ≤2.5 x ULN No prior treatment with other camptothecin drug. ≥ 21 days since completion of prior chemotherapy, ≥6 weeks since prior MitomycinC ECOG Performance Status 01 Negative pregnancy test for female patients
